comment: Sir, you are awesome.. you have no idea, how helpful these lectures have been. Thanks a ton....
physics 1 is the foundation of entire physics. The analysis method is the basis for the contents. I am happy to someone to break down these fundamentals and it very nice to review of these basics.
Why question 5 not C? The cart speed up means it acceleration?
because acceleration can be found as the slope of the velocity graph. the velocity graph has a constant slope so the acceleration is also constant (straight line across).
Dej Dej thank you. I understand now
